programme.title: All Is Lost
programme.desc: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a sailor finds himself staring his mortality in the face.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: Based on the true story of one family caught in the 2004 tsunami that devastated Southeast Asia.

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: The true story of conscientious objector Desmond Doss who saved 75 men in WWII without firing a gun.

programme.title: Stronger
programme.desc: The inspiring true story of the real life 2013 Boston Marathon bombing survivor Jeff Bauman.

programme.title: Texas Killing Fields
programme.desc: In the Texas bayous, a local detective works with a New York cop to investigate a series of unsolved murders.

programme.title: Alex Cross
programme.desc: Dr. Alex Cross is a homicide detective/psychologist with the Detroit PD who is hunting a serial killer.

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: A hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

programme.title: Midnight in the Switchgrass
programme.desc: An FBI agent and Florida State officer team up to investigate a string of unsolved murder cases.

programme.title: Mindcage
programme.desc: Two detectives seek the help of a brilliant serial killer when a copycat killer strikes.

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: Unable to solve a series of homicides, the FBI enlists a retired consultant with psychic powers.
